title: Council of Economic Advisers Releases Report to Congress on the Economic Impact of the Recovery Act | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




September 10, 2009

 



Council of Economic Advisers Releases Report to Congress on the Economic Impact of the Recovery Act




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                 September 10, 2009  The Council of Economic Advisers today released "The Economic Impact of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009," the first in a series of quarterly reports CEA is charged with providing to Congress on the effects of the Recovery Act on the economy, and employment in particular. A copy of the report is attached.
